    8130 result.params = params;
    8230 result.handlerFn = fn;
    8330 return result;
    84 }
    85
    863 var result = new RegExpRouterResult();
    873 result.warning = 'NotFound';
    883 return result;
    89};
    90
    911RegExpRouter.prototype.truncate = function(path, pattern) {
    927 if (pattern !== '*') {
    936 if (pattern[0] !== '^') {
    941 pattern = '^' + pattern; // make sure it's a prefix
    95 }
    96
    976 var re = new RegExp(pattern);
    98
    996 return path.replace(re, '');
    100 } else {
    1011 return path;
    102 }
    103};
    104
    1051RegExpRouter.create = RegExpRouter.prototype.create = function() {
    10671 return new RegExpRouter();
    107};

    898
    8991 var _http = function() {};

    9101 return {
    911 write: function(str) {

    9131 done();
    914 },
    915 end: function() {},
    916 on: function() {}
    917 };
    918 };
